quest.name: Treasure-hunting Tykes
journal:
 Quest Sync
Yalric appears to be having a heated disagreement with his friends.
objectives: Search for hidden treasure in the Forest of the Lost Shepherd.
Deliver the treasure chest to Yalric.

dialogue.name: YALRIC
dialogue.text: I'm telling you, it'll be fine! Let's go and find the treasure!

dialogue.name: VONNDEN
dialogue.text: Are you mad, Yalric? If Mother finds out we went to the forest, I don't even want to think about what she'll─hm?

dialogue.name: VAYNE
dialogue.text: Oh, hullo there, missusmister traveler. What can we do for you? Wait─did you hear us talking about the treasure!?

dialogue.name: VONNDEN
dialogue.text: Shhh, Vayne! Oh, it's too late now. We'll share our secret with you─just promise you won't tell anyone, okay? We were playing by our favorite tree, and we found a bottle stuffed into a hollow. And inside the bottle...was a treasure map!

dialogue.name: VONNDEN
dialogue.text: You look like you've been all over the place. Have you ever hunted for treasure? Hey, maybe you could go treasure hunting for us!

dialogue.name: VONNDEN
dialogue.text: We were going to go ourselves, but if the grown-ups caught us sneaking around in the forest, we'd be in real trouble. Please, won't you do this for us?

dialogue.name: YALRIC
dialogue.text: Awww, I wanted to be the one to dig up the treasure... But fine. You can go, as long as we get to split the treasure four ways. We're the ones who found the map, after all!

dialogue.name: VAYNE
dialogue.text: Thanks, missusmister traveler! Here's the map. The treasure's buried to the east of here, right where you see that big red cross. Good luck!

dialogue.name: YALRIC
dialogue.text: Why do you grown-ups get to have all the fun? I can't wait until I'm old enough to go searching for treasure by myself...

dialogue.name: VONNDEN
dialogue.text: See that big red cross east of Sullen? That's where the treasure's buried! What do you think it is?

dialogue.name: VAYNE
dialogue.text: Thanks for helping us, missusmister traveler! And good luck finding our treasure!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Digging up the earth, you find a weathered wooden casket!

dialogue.name: YALRIC
dialogue.text: Well? Did you find the treasure? Did you!?

dialogue.name: YALRIC
dialogue.text: Huh? It's full of old rings...

dialogue.name: VONNDEN
dialogue.text: Wait...I've seen these before in a picture book! These are the rings that the people in the Church of the First Light used to wear!

dialogue.name: YALRIC
dialogue.text: The Church? You mean those crazy people who used to worship the Light? Well, they're not around anymore, so I guess they won't mind us taking their treasure! Haha!

dialogue.name: YALRIC
dialogue.text: Remember, we're splitting it four ways, just like we promised. You can take the first pick, stranger. After all, we never would have found the treasure without you!
